title: Design Toscano Sous la Vigne Pedestal Plant Stand, Dimensions: 15" Wx15 Dx36 H 43 lbs, Bronze
features: ELEVATE YOUR ARTWORK - Your favorite statue will be the crowning glory of our Sous la Vigne columns depicting a cute cherub supporting lush vines laden with ripe grapes destined to become fine wine
INDOOR OUTDOOR PLANT STANDS - Topped by your lush fern, delicate flower or other potted plants, our European style pedestals are at home in an indoor entryway or outdoor garden bed

HIGH QUALITY FURNITURE - Hand-cast using real crushed stone bonded with durable designer resin, our sculptural pillars are topped with a UV resistant faux green bronze finish so they are equally at home on your outdoor patio
DESIGN TOSCANO DISPLAY STAND - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this French Rococo style pedestal is a versatile design that can be used as a side table, plant stand or alone as sculptures
Our decorative column measures 15"Wx15"Dx36"H and weighs 43 lbs making it perfect for displaying another sculpture or house plant
description: A blending of pure European artistic style with the function of a quality yard tall pedestal, this French Rococo-inspired classic is deeply sculpted with a chubby cherub beneath a bountiful grapevine. Cast in faux bronze designer resin, alone or displaying a favorite sculpture, it adds instant art and architecture to any room or gallery. 15"dia.x36"H. 43 lbs.
